biotools.summary: A web-based application for the mapping of prokaryotic genes and the corresponding proteins to common gene regulatory and metabolic networks. Users input a list of genes from which shared operons, co-expressed genes and shared regulators are detected. Common metabolic pathways are then viewed on KEGG maps.

bioschemas.name: ProdoNet
